org.modelio.api.module

Interface IModuleAPIConfiguration


  • public interface IModuleAPIConfiguration
    This interface describe the API of module configuration for API use.

    Module configuration provide access to module parameter and resource paths.

    Available only on IPeerModule

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Path> getDocpath()
      Returns the documentation path.
      Path getModuleResourcesPath()
      Get the path where the files packaged with the module were deployed.
      Map<String,String> getParameters()
      Get all parameter values.
      String getParameterValue(String key)
      Get the value of the parameter identified by the given key.
      Path getProjectSpacePath()
      Get the directory where the project is located.
      boolean isLocked(String key)
      Get the lock status of the parameter identified by the given key.
      boolean setParameterValue(String key, String value)
      Set the value of a parameter.
      void updateFrom(Map<String,String> parameters)
      Update the mdac parameters with the given ones.

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterValue

        String getParameterValue(String key)
        Get the value of the parameter identified by the given key.

        Returns null if the key does not exist

        Parameters:
        key - Key of the parameter
        Returns:
        The value of the key parameter (or null)

      • getParameters

        Map<String,String> getParameters()
        Get all parameter values.
        Returns:
        A map representing the parameter name as key and the parameter value as value.

      • setParameterValue

        boolean setParameterValue(String key,
                        String value)
        Set the value of a parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the parameter
        value - Value to define on the parameter
        Returns:
        true if the parameter is only locally defined.

      • updateFrom

        void updateFrom(Map<String,String> parameters)
        Update the mdac parameters with the given ones.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The new module parameter values.

      • getProjectSpacePath

        Path getProjectSpacePath()
        Get the directory where the project is located. This directory can be used as the root directory where generation modules output files.
        Returns:
        the project space path

      • getModuleResourcesPath

        Path getModuleResourcesPath()
        Get the path where the files packaged with the module were deployed. It allows the module to access its resource files.
        Returns:
        the module resources path.

      • getDocpath

        List<Path> getDocpath()
        Returns the documentation path.
        Returns:
        the documentation path.

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked(String key)
        Get the lock status of the parameter identified by the given key.

        A parameter is locked when defined by a Modelio server.

        Parameters:
        key - Key of the parameter
        Returns:
        Whether or not the given parameter is locked.
